scripts.sync-preview: npm run build-preview && npm run images-preview && npm run static-preview && npm run html-preview
scripts.sync-prod: npm run build-prod && npm run images-prod && npm run static-prod && npm run html-prod
scripts.html-preview: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/dist s3://preview.slidetherapy.com --delete --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --cache-control public,max-age=600
scripts.html-prod: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/dist s3://slidetherapy.com --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --cache-control public,max-age=600
scripts.static-preview: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/dist s3://preview.slidetherapy.com --delete --exclude "*" --include "*.css" --include "*.js" --include "*.map" --cache-control public,max-age=31536000
scripts.static-prod: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/dist s3://slidetherapy.com --exclude "*" --include "*.css" --include "*.js" --include "*.map" --cache-control public,max-age=31536000
scripts.images-preview: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/images s3://preview.slidetherapy.com/images --delete --exclude "*" --include "*.png" --include "*.jpg" --include "*.jpeg" --include "*.gif" --cache-control public,max-age=31536000
scripts.images-prod: AWS_PROFILE=slide-therapy aws s3 sync ./client/images s3://slidetherapy.com/images --exclude "*" --include "*.png" --include "*.jpg" --include "*.jpeg" --include "*.gif" --cache-control public,max-age=31536000
